name: GNBCUUPFunction
description: NR gNB Central Unit (CU) User Plane (UP) resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: peeParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter list for the control and monitoring of power, energy and environment

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: pLMNIdList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of PLMN-Id: Mobile Country Codes (MCC) or Mobile Network Codes(MNC) (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: gNBId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identifies a gNB within a PLMN (3GPP 38.300)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: eP_E1
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of E1 interface between gNB-CU-CP and gNB-CU-UP

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: eP_F1U
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of user plane interface (F1-U) between DU and CU or CU-UP

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: eP_XnU
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of Xn user plane (Xn-U) interface between two NG-RAN nodes

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: eP_NgU
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of NG user plane (NG-U) interface between gNB and UPGW

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: eP_X2U
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of X2 user plane (X2-U) interface

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: eP_S1U
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Local end point of S1-U interface towards S-GW node
